name: ListenLoop
author: Sandeep Arneja

sections.description:
ListenLoop is B2B retargeting and micro survey solution company. WordPress is being widely used as a web app nowadays, so ListenLoop is an ideal companion app to retarget your prospects and leads, contact them, get their attention, and survey them over time so you convert those leads into paying customers.

This plugin generates the Javascript install code to integrate all of this functionality into your WordPress-powered web app.

To use listenloop on your website its javascript must be added to all pages. This plugin automatically adds that javascript tag to the footer of all pages.

There also is a setting page where you must provide the listenloop key. The plugin will use that key to correctly include the javascript tag on all pages.

For more information visit:

ListenLoop
sections.installation:
1. Upload listenloop directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the listenloop public key from ListenLoop (0000000) to the settings (Admin > Settings > ListenLoop)
sections.faq:
What on earth is ListenLoop and what is a Retargeting?

Take a look at http://get.listenloop.com, they explain it better than I can!

I have added the file, but data is not showing in listenloop?

To use listenloop correctly you must add your listenloop I on the listenloop settings page.

How do I get my listenloop key

Visit ListenLoop, take a demo and sign up for an account. Then on settings page inside your account you find your listenloop key.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial Build

1.1

  • Added banners and icons to the assets folder
